# Demo URLs for Print Mode Testing

## üåê Test URLs for Browser

### 1. Ngrok URL with Print Mode (Full Resolution)
Open this in your browser to see the print mode in action:

```
https://d1fda6028e97.ngrok-free.app/?print=true&%3D&dpi=300&width=3937&height=5511
```

### 2. Local URL with Print Mode (if running locally on port 8080)
```
http://localhost:8080/?print=true&%3D&dpi=300&width=3937&height=5511
```

### 3. Smaller Test Version (for easier viewing in browser)
This version uses smaller dimensions so it fits better in your browser window:

```
https://d1fda6028e97.ngrok-free.app/?print=true&%3D&dpi=96&width=800&height=1120
```

## üîç What You'll See

When you open these URLs, you should see:
1. **All UI elements hidden** (no sidebar, controls, or navigation)
2. **Map in full screen** at the specified dimensions
3. **Map centered on Nabha, Punjab** at zoom level 12.91
4. **A heart marker** at the specified coordinates (though currently showing as dot - needs fix)
5. **Title at bottom**: "Nabha, Punjab, India" with coordinates

## üìù Query Parameters Explained

- `print=true` - Enables print mode (hides UI)
- `config=<base64>` - Base64-encoded JSON configuration
- `dpi=300` - Sets the DPI for high-resolution rendering
- `width=3937` - Width in pixels
- `height=5511` - Height in pixels

## üéØ The Configuration

The encoded configuration contains:
```json
{
  "layout": {
    "type": "single",
    "shape": "default"
  },
  "style": "mapbox://styles/dodo791/cmfdyppfj009701s3egb640uv",
  "maps": [{
    "center": [76.15115616552049, 30.375335181807543],
    "zoom": 12.914555399926938,
    "bearing": 0,
    "pitch": 0,
    "previewWidth": 640,
    "markers": [{
      "coordinates": [76.14510016883173, 30.374937436079946],
      "icon": "heart",
      "color": "#1B1B1B"
    }],
    "title": {
      "enabled": true,
      "largeText": "Nabha, Punjab, India",
      "smallText": "30.375¬∞N / 76.151¬∞E",
      "font": "Montserrat"
    }
  }],
  "frame": {
    "enabled": false
  },
  "print": {
    "width": 50,
    "height": 70,
    "dpi": 200,
    "orientation": "portrait",
    "format": "PNG"
  }
}
```

## üí° Tips
- The first URL might take a moment to load due to ngrok
- You might see a ngrok warning page first - just click "Visit Site"
- Check browser console for any errors
- The map should load with all UI hidden and show only the map itself
